title: UWP App to App communication via Launcher.LaunchUriForResultsAsync returns NULL if client App closed manually
body: When starting another UWP Client App out of an UWP App via Launcher.LaunchUriForResultsAsync the returning Result is NULL when the Client App has been closed via ALT+F4 or Window Close Button even if in the Application.Current.Suspending += CurrentOnSuspending event the Result has explicitly returned via ProtocolForResultsOperation.ReportCompleted
